description: Specify the account suppression list preferences for a configuration set.

parameters.name: ConfigurationSetName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration set to change the suppression list preferences for.

parameters.name: SuppressedReasons
parameters.description: A list that contains the reasons that email addresses are automatically added to the suppression list for your account. This list can contain any or all of the following: COMPLAINT --- Amazon SES adds an email address to the suppression list for your account when a message sent to that address results in a complaint. BOUNCE --- Amazon SES adds an email address to the suppression list for your account when a message sent to that address results in a hard bounce. (string) --- The reason that the address was added to the suppression list for your account. The value can be one of the following: COMPLAINT --- Amazon SES added an email address to the suppression list for your account because a message sent to that address results in a complaint. BOUNCE --- Amazon SES added an email address to the suppression list for your account because a message sent to that address results in a hard bounce.
